ARABIC: وَإِذَا نَادَيْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱتَّخَذُوهَا هُزُوًا وَلَعِبًا ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَعْقِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When you call to salat they make a mockery and a game of it. That is because they are people who do not use their intellect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Nor make friends with) those who, when you call (the faithful) to prayer, make mock of it and jest, because they do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when you call for Prayer, they take it for a mockery and sport. That is because they are a people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Because they are devoid of understanding, they ridicule your call for prayers saying that it is a useless act.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when you call to prayer, they mock and make fun of it; this is because they are people without any sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when you proclaim the call for the Salah, they take it (but) as a mockery and fun; that is because they are a people who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when you call to prayer they make it a mockery and a joke; this is because they are a people who do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and when you call to prayer, take it in mockery and as a sport; that is because they are a people who have no understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when ye call to prayer they take it for a jest and sport. That is because they are a folk who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When you call them to prayer, they treat it as a jest and a diversion. This is because they are devoid of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when ye call for the prayer they make a mockery and fun thereof. This because they are a people who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When you call to prayer, they take it in derision and play. That is because they are a people who do not exercise their reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When ye proclaim your call to prayer they take it (but) as mockery and sport; that is because they are a people without understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when you proclaim the call for As-Salat [call for the prayer (Adhan)], they take it (but) as a mockery and fun; that is because they are a people who understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When you call to prayer, they treat it as a jest and a pastime. That is because they are a people who have no understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When you call to the prayer, they take it as a joke and a trifle. That is because they are people who do not reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when you call to prayer, they take it in ridicule and amusement. That is because they are a people who do not use reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:58] And, those who, when you make the call to prayer, take it, that is, the prayer, in mockery and as a game, mocking it and laughing at it among themselves; that, [mocking] attitude, is because they are a people who   do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when ye call to prayer) through the call to prayer (adhan) and the call announcing the start of the prayer (iqamah) (they take it for a jest and sport) they take it as a joke and falsehood. (That) jest (is because they are a folk who understand not) Allah's command nor do they know Allah's divine Oneness nor His religion. This verse was revealed about a Jewish man who used to poke fun at Bilal's call to prayer, and so Allah burned him.
